Description: "Mean score on the Affinity for Technology Interaction (ATI) scale asking specifically about RStudio. Higher scores indicate greater affininty
column3: with a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 6."

Description: "Mean score on the Utilising Computer Software subscale of the Self-Efficacy in Statistical Practice scale. Higher scores indicate greater self-efficacy
column3: with a minimum of 1 and maximum of 11."

Description: Mean score on the Coding Confidence subscale of the Elementary Student Coding Attitudes Survey - University. Higher scores indicate greater confidence, with a minimum of 1 and a maximum of 6.
